verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הַיֹּרְדִ֤ים <S%H3381><s%> to them that go down מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5833><s%> for help עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> on horses יִשָּׁעֵ֑נוּ <S%H8172><s%> and stay וַיִּבְטְח֨וּ <S%H982><s%> and trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in רֶ֜כֶב <S%H7393><s%> in chariots כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because רָ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> because [they are] many וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and in פָּֽרָשִׁים֙ <S%H6571><s%> and in horsemen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָצְמ֣וּ <S%H6105><s%> strong מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> because they are very וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁעוּ֙ <S%H8159><s%> but they look עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> not unto the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H1875><s%> neither seek

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> Yet he also [is] wise וַיָּ֣בֵא <S%H935><s%> and will bring רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> evil וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָ֖יו <S%H1697><s%> his words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not הֵסִ֑יר <S%H5493><s%> and will not call back וְקָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> but will arise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> against the house מְרֵעִ֔ים <S%H7489><s%> of the evildoers וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against עֶזְרַ֖ת <S%H5833><s%> and against the help פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> of them that work אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> iniquity

וּמִצְרַ֤יִם <S%H4714><s%> Now the Egyptians אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> [are] men וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> and not God וְסוּסֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5483><s%> and their horses בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and not spirit וַֽיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD יַטֶּ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> shall stretch out יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְכָשַׁ֤ל <S%H3782><s%> shall fall עוֹזֵר֙ <S%H5826><s%> both he that helpeth וְנָפַ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall down עָזֻ֔ר <S%H5826><s%> and he that is holpen וְיַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together כֻּלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> and all יִכְלָיֽוּן׃ <S%H3615><s%> and they all shall fail ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> spoken יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> For thus hath the LORD אֵלַ֡י <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יֶהְגֶּה֩ <S%H1897><s%> roaring הָאַרְיֵ֨ה <S%H738><s%> unto me Like as the lion וְהַכְּפִ֜יר <S%H3715><s%> and the young lion עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over טַרְפּ֗וֹ <S%H2964><s%> on his prey אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִקָּרֵ֤א <S%H7121><s%> is called forth עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> Against מְלֹ֣א <S%H4393><s%> when a multitude רֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> of shepherds מִקּוֹלָם֙ <S%H6963><s%> of their voice לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵחָ֔ת <S%H2865><s%> against him [he] will not be afraid וּמֵֽהֲמוֹנָ֖ם <S%H1995><s%> himself for the noise לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יַֽעֲנֶ֑ה <S%H6031><s%> nor abase כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> So יֵרֵד֙ <S%H3381><s%> come down יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of them so shall the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לִצְבֹּ֥א <S%H6633><s%> to fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> for mount צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over גִּבְעָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1389><s%> and for the hill

כְּצִפֳּרִ֣ים <S%H6833><s%> As birds עָפ֔וֹת <S%H5774><s%> flying כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> so יָגֵ֛ן <S%H1598><s%> defend יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> so will the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem גָּנ֥וֹן <S%H1598><s%> defending וְהִצִּ֖יל <S%H5337><s%> also he will deliver פָּסֹ֥חַ <S%H6452><s%> [it and] passing over וְהִמְלִֽיט׃ <S%H4422><s%> he will preserve

שׁ֗וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn לַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶעְמִ֥יקוּ <S%H6009><s%> have deeply סָרָ֖ה <S%H5627><s%> revolted בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ye unto [him from] whom the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> that בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִמְאָס֗וּן <S%H3988><s%> shall cast away אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֱלִילֵ֣י <S%H457><s%> his idols כַסְפּ֔וֹ <S%H3701><s%> of silver וֶאֱלִילֵ֖י <S%H457><s%> and his idols זְהָב֑וֹ <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> have made לָכֶ֛ם יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> which your own hands חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> unto you [for] a sin

וְנָפַ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> fall אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> Then shall the Assyrian בְּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> not of a mighty man וְחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and the sword לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> not of a mean man תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> shall devour וְנָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> him but he shall flee לוֹ֙ מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> from חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וּבַחוּרָ֖יו <S%H970><s%> and his young men לָמַ֥ס <S%H4522><s%> shall be discomfited יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> will become

וְסַלְעוֹ֙ <S%H5553><s%> to his strong hold מִמָּג֣וֹר <S%H4032><s%> for fear יַֽעֲב֔וֹר <S%H5674><s%> And he shall pass over וְחַתּ֥וּ <S%H2865><s%> shall be afraid מִנֵּ֖ס <S%H5251><s%> of the ensign שָׂרָ֑יו <S%H8269><s%> and his princes נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose א֥וּר <S%H217><s%> whose fire לוֹ֙ בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> [is] in Zion וְתַנּ֥וּר <S%H8574><s%> and his furnace ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem ס
